title: Unknown DirectX Error Is Preventing Me From Playing The Game
body:
So I haven't been able to play League today. I was linked to this thread: https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements-en/mIwrE208-directx-bug-causing-players-to-be-unable-to-reconnect-to-games and tried that fix.

I've tried modifying my game.cfg, deleting my game AND input cfgs as well as clearing the en_client folders from RADS and repairing my game.

None of these fixes worked despite that thread saying that the problem was fixed in a patch almost a month ago.

Can anyone help? I want to play League again.

Also my DirectX is updated and my graphics card drivers are up to date.

replies.body:
That specific post linked above is in regards to a different issue that was since resolved.  There is a different DirectX issue currently, though, for some players with AMD graphics cards per our current [sticky](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/x6ylTzIT-5172017-directx-issues-with-amdradeon-graphics-cards).  If you are using one, the current fix we have is to rollback to a[ previous driver.](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/x6ylTzIT-5172017-directx-issues-with-amdradeon-graphics-cards)

Should the issue persist, go over each step of our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to double check any issues with hardware, drivers, or even game files.

Test it in a custom and let me know if that helps.
I have now also tried completely reinstalling the game with no luck.
